Description: All attacks have a chance to flinch (Roll 1 dice)

Name: Absorb Bulb
Description: Boosts the Special by 1 of the user when hit with a Water type move. Consumed on use.

Name: Air Balloon
Description: The user is immune to Ground type moves. This item bursts once the user is hit.

Name: Assault Vest
Description: Increases Special Defense by 2. But the user cannot use Support moves.

Name: Big Root
Description: When using absorbing hp, roll 3 chance dice to heal 1 additional hp.

Name: Binding Band
Description: Binding moves now have double the damage pool.

Name: Black Sludge
Description: Poison type Pokemon may heal 1 hp as a bonus action. This can be done 10 times before depleting. Non-poison types take 1 damage per turn from holding this.

Name: Blue Scarf
Description: Increases Beauty by 1 during contests.

Name: Blunder Policy
Description: Raises Dexterity by 2 when the Pokemon misses.

Name: Bright Powder
Description: Removes 1 die from the opponent's accuracy pool.

Name: Cell Battery
Description: Boosts the Strength by 1 of the user when hit with a Electric type move. Consumed on use.

Name: Choice Band
Description: Increases the Strength by 1 but the Pokemon may only use the first move it used at the start, but it can still evade. This effect is rest on switch in.

Name: Choice Scarf
Description: Increases the Dexterity by 1 but the Pokemon may only use the first move it used at the start, but it can still evade. This effect is rest on switch in.

Name: Choice Specs
Description: Increases the Special by 1 but the Pokemon may only use the first move it used at the start, but it can still evade. This effect is rest on switch in.

Name: Cleanse Tag
Description: Reduces the chance of random Wild Pokémon encounters.

Name: Damp Rock
Description: Rain Dance now sets Rainy Weather for 7 turns.

Name: Dark Rock
Description: New Moon now sets New Moon for 7 turns.

Name: Destiny Knot
Description: When the Pokemon is infatuated, the opponent also becomes infatuated.

Name: Eject Button
Description: When the Pokemon is hit with a damaging move, it switches out immediately and the item is consumed.

Name: Eject Pack
Description: When the Pokemon's stats are reduced, it switches out immediately and the item is consumed.

Name: Electric Seed
Description: Increases Defense by 1 in Electric Terrain, it is consumed on use.

Name: Flame Orb
Description: Inflicts the user with Burn 1 when held.

Name: Float Stone
Description: The Pokemon's weight is halved.

Name: Focus Band
Description: If an attack were to reduce the user's hp to 0 by a damaging move. Roll 1 chance dice to survive at 1 hp.

Name: Focus Sash
Description: If this Pokemon were to faint from a damaging move, reduce its hp to 1 instead. The item breaks upon use.

Name: Grassy Seed
Description: Increases Defense by 1 in Grassy Terrain, it is consumed on use.

Name: Green Scarf
Description: Increases Clever by 1 during contests.

Name: Grip Claw
Description: Binding moves now lasts an additional 2 rounds.

Name: Heat Rock
Description: Sunny Day now sets Sunny Weather for 7 turns.

Name: Heavy Duty Boots
Description: The user is now immune to entry hazards.

Name: Icy Rock
Description: Hail now sets Hail Weather for 7 turns.

Name: Iron Ball
Description: Reduces the holder's Dexterity by 2 and makes them subsceptable to Ground type moves.

Name: Lagging Tail
Description: This holder always goes last in the the initiative order.

Name: Leftovers
Description: The holder may heal 1 hp as a bonus action. This can be done 10 times before depleting.

Name: Light Clay
Description: Light Screen and Reflect now lasts 7 rounds.

Name: Luminous Moss
Description: Boosts the Special Defense by 1 of the user when hit with a Water type move. Consumed on use.

Name: Mental Herb
Description: If the user is Infatuated or affected by Taunt, Torment, Encore, or Disable, then they are cured but the item gets consumed.

Name: Metronome
Description: Increases the damage pool of moves by 1 when used consecutively up to 3 times.

Name: Misty Seed
Description: Increases Special Defense by 1 in Misty Terrain, it is consumed on use.

Name: Muscle Band
Description: Boosts the power of all Physical moves by 1.

Name: Pink Scarf
Description: Increases Cute by 1 during contests.

Name: Power Herb
Description: Allows the user to use Charge moves immediately. It is consumed upon use.

Name: Protective Pad
Description: The user is immune to contact effects.

Name: Psychic Seed
Description: Increases Special Defense by 1 in Psychic Terrain Terrain, it is consumed on use.

Name: Red Card
Description: When the Pokemon is hit with a damaging move, the attacker switches out immediately and the item is consumed.

Name: Red Scarf
Description: Increases Cool by 1 during contests.

Name: Ring Target
Description: The user loses their type immunity to moves.

Name: Room Service
Description: Reduces the user's Initiative by 2 during Trick Room.

Name: Safety Goggles
Description: The user is immune to Weather related damage as well as Powder moves.

Name: Scope Lens
Description: All moves are now High Critical.

Name: Shed Shell
Description: The user is immune to effects that would prevent them from switching out.

Name: Shell Bell
Description: Restores 1 hp everytime the user inflicts damage.

Name: Smoke Bomb
Description: The user can escape from any Wild Encounter.

Name: Smooth Rock
Description: Sandstorm now sets Sandstorm Weather for 7 rounds.

Name: Snowball
Description: Boosts the Strength by 1 of the user when hit with a Ice type move. Consumed on use.

Name: Sticky Barb
Description: Damages the user for 3 hp per round. If hit by a foe with no held items, it will transfer onto them.

Name: Terrain Extender
Description: Terrain moves now lasts for an additional 3 rounds.

Name: Throat Spray
Description: Increases Special by 1 when the user uses a Sound based move for the first time.

Name: Utility Umbrella
Description: The user is immune to the effects of weather.

Name: Weakness Policy
Description: When hit by a move the Pokemon is weak to, increase Strength and Special by 2.

Name: White Herbs
Description: The user may restore all lowered stats in battle as a bonus action. It is consumed upon use.

Name: Wise Glasses
Description: Boosts the power of all Special moves by 1.

Name: Yellow Scarf
Description: Increases Tough by 1 during contests.

Name: Zoom Lens
Description: Increases accuracy by 2 if the user is lower than the target on the initiative order.

Name: Jaboca Berry
Description: Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Physical Attack, Roll 2 Die of damage against the attacker. Consumed on use.

Name: Rowap Berry
Description: Whenever this Pokémon is hit with a Special Attack, Roll 2 Die of damage against the attacker. Consumed on use.

Name: Big Camping Tent
Description: A spacious tent for your group to stay a cozy night. Sprayed with Wild Pokemon repellent substances.

Name: Small Camping Tent
Description: A comfortable space for 1 person, or 2 if you don't mind squeezing.

Name: Sleeping Bag
Description: Not too comfortable. You'll be able to sleep warm and dry but after a few nights your back may hurt.

Name: Camping Stove & Cookware
Description: Forget about hunting and eating roots like a savage. With this luxury set you'll always have a warm meal.

Name: Canned Meal
Description: It's nothing fancy but there's no need to travel on an empty stomach. One can is enough for one day

Name: Regional Map
Description: A map with the marked routes, cities and Pokemon Centers of the region you are in.

Name: Compass
Description: A useful compass to point you in the right direction. Warning: Keep away from magnets.

Name: Pokedex
Description: A digital encyclopedia with basic information about regional Pokemon. You may add your own research.

Name: Pokedex Upgrade
Description: Upgrade your Pokedex with the information of the Pokemon on a new region.

Name: Mountain Bike
Description: You will travel twice as fast with this awesome all-terrain bike. Now at an insane price!

Name: Inflatable Boat
Description: A small boat for a single person. Your pokemon may pull you through the water or you can use the rows

Name: Fishing Rod
Description: A fishing rod to catch pokemon living underwater. Somedays they just won't bite, though.

Name: Saddle
Description: Strap this on and you'll never worry about falling from your pokemon again.

Name: Sled
Description: Your pokemon can pull you around through snow, sand, or any smooth surface. It's super fun!

Name: Pokedolls
Description: Life-size decoy used to escape wild pokemon. Some people like to collect them.

Name: Repel
Description: Most pokemon won't come neaer to you for a whole day. The smell is now machine washable.

Name: Pepper Spray Can
Description: Scares away small pokemon, but it may enrage the bigger ones. Good for 5 uses.

Name: Potion
Description: A pocket sized spary potion to relieve the pain and heal bruises

Name: Super Potion
Description: A regular can of concentrated formula spray. This potion can close open wounds and even heal a cracked bone.

Name: Hyper Potion
Description: Best value pack. It can be rationed for smaller injuries on the team
Type Bonus: or used all at once on a serious wound.

Name: Max Potion
Description: A single-use capsule of formula. The pokemon won't be able to restore health further until the next day.

Name: Full Restore
Description: A single-use capsule of deluxe formula. The pokemon won't be able to restore health until the next day.

Name: Antidote
Description: A shot that quickly reduces the fever and relieves the pain.

Name: Awakening
Description: Sprays a water-based solution to awake a drowsy pokemon.

Name: Burn Heal
Description: A powder that douses the fire and aids in the healing of the burnt area.

Name: Ice Heal
Description: Recovers the normal termperature of the pokemon and heals frost bite.

Name: Paralyze Heal
Description: This ointment relaxes the muscles and stops the cramping

Name: Full Heal
Description: A superior spray formula that can heal any status problem in a second.

Name: Energy Root
Description: A nasty tasting root with mystical properties that can be eaten whole or turned into up to 4 batches of powder if you know how to do it.

Name: Energy Powder
Description: This powder leaves a horrid aftertaste, but at least it stops the pain

Name: Heal Powder
Description: A mix of the most foul looking herbs you can find can make this cure-all powder

Name: Revival Herb
Description: It may be its magical properties or just its awful flavor, but this herb will get you back into consciousness numbing all the pain away. ***Extremely rare to find.***

Name: Revive
Description: A small energy shard that brings a fainted Human or pokemon back into conciousness and stabilizes their wounds.

Name: Max Revive
Description: A bigger shard that is not available to the public

Name: Berry Juice
Description: This mixed drink of various berries is also quite refreshing. Some pokemono produce it naturally.

Name: Fresh Water
Description: Full of electrolytes and just the right amount of sodium, restores the vitality of those who are tired.

Name: Sodapop
Description: This sugary drink grives you a quick shot of energy after being quite tired.

Name: Lemonade
Description: The citric boost and added vitamins make this a favorite after exercise.

Name: MooMoo Milk
Description: Found in organic farms, this milk is full of calcium and is right out of the Miltank

Name: Pokeball
Description: A basic ball for catching pokemon and carrying heavy items.

Name: Greatball
Description: A sturdier barrier protects the seal allowing easier catch.

Name: Ultraball
Description: The best seal in the market to ensure the catch of stronger pokemon.

Name: Masterball
Description: It is said to be in development by some companies in the world, and rumored to have a seal so strong it would never break.

Name: Pokemon Dry Food Pack
Description: A bag with dry kibble.

Name: Gourmet Food Can
Description: Made with Premium ingredients. All pokemon will love you if you feed them this on a regular basis.

Name: High Performance Food Sack
Description: A high-protein kibble made for athletics. *Add 1 dice to the next Training Roll of the pokemon.*

Name: Protein
Description: A tasty milkshake that aids in the growth of bigger and stronger muscles.

Name: Iron
Description: An iron capsule that reduces feebleness and gives you a healthy glow.

Name: Calcium
Description: Add this effervescent pill to their drink to help grow stronger bones.

Name: Zinc
Description: Zinc capsules help with focus and brain development

Name: Carbos
Description: A healthy syrup that fills you with energy!

Name: Pp Up
Description: It is rumered they are just sugar pills. Who really knows?

Name: Hp Up
Description: A compendium of vitamins and minerals to help your pokemono grow as big and healthy as it can be.

Name: Rare Candy
Description: This strange candy is made of unknown ingredients. Its effects do not stack.

Name: Grooming Kit
Description: No more matted hair, unruly leaves, dry scales, or rough rocks!

Name: Pokemon Costume
Description: Fashionable clothes. Your companions will look amazing in these costumes and they will love it.

Name: Piece of Accessory
Description: Ribbons, hats, collars, and everything you need to make them look super special.

Name: Fire Stone
Description: This Stone has a flame inside, it's hot to the touch.

Name: Thunder Stone
Description: It glows in the dark and can be used to power small electronics.

Name: Water Stone
Description: Looks like blue glass and can be found at the bottom of the sea.

Name: Leaf Stone
Description: It is said that the leaf encrusted to it comes from the tree of life itself

Name: Moon Stone
Description: It is a black stone that turns white and luminescent when the moon shines over it.

Name: Sun Stone
Description: A red stone that shines brightly when facing the sun in the morning.

Name: Shiny Stone
Description: Its crystal-like surface aloows you to see a ball of light inside.

Name: Dusk Stone
Description: This stone seems to suck the light around into a small dark hole.

Name: Dawn Stone
Description: This cerulean stone shines with blinding light for a minute during sunrise.
